sections.heading: community, defined; fiscal year
sections.text: Learning community means a political subdivision which shares the territory of member school districts and is governed by a learning community coordinating council. The fiscal year for a learning community shall be the same as for member school districts.SourceLaws 20

79-2101.Learning community, defined; fiscal year.

Learning community means a political subdivision which shares the territory of member school districts and is governed by a learning community coordinating council. The fiscal year for a learning community shall be the same as for member school districts.

SourceLaws 2006, LB 1024, ยง 103;Laws 2007, LB641, ยง 35.
